# 1. Loading the needed libraries

For this take-home exercise 1, I will be using some of the libraries below:

tidyverse patchwork ggrepel ggthemes hrbrthemes


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(ggrepel, patchwork, 
               ggthemes, hrbrthemes,
               tidyverse) 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
first_quarter <- read_csv("data/ResidentialTransaction20240308160536.csv")

list_of_files <- list.files(path = "data",
                            recursive = TRUE,
                            pattern = "\\.csv$",
                            full.names = TRUE)

Realis <- read_csv(list_of_files)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Realis <- Realis %>% 
  mutate(`Sale Date FORMAT` = format(as.Date((parse_date_time(`Sale Date`, 
        orders = c("%d %b %Y")))), "%b %Y"))

colSums(is.na(Realis))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(Realis)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(x = `Unit Price ($ PSM)`)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 20, color = "grey10", fill = "lightblue")+
  ggtitle("Distribution of Unit Price ($PSM") +
  theme_ipsum_gs(axis_title_size = 15, base_size = 10, grid = "Y")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(x = `Property Type`)) + 
  geom_bar(color = "grey10", fill = "lightblue") + 
  theme(axis.text=element_text(size=6)) +
  ggtitle("Number of sales on different Property type")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(x = `Planning Region`)) +
  geom_bar(color = "grey10", fill = "lightblue") +
  ggtitle("Number of sales in different Planning Region")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(x = `Planning Region`, y = `Unit Price ($ PSM)`)) +
  geom_boxplot(color = "grey10", fill = "lightblue") + 
  geom_point(stat="summary", fun ="mean", color = "red") +
  ggtitle("Unit Price ($PSM) in different Planning Region")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(x = `Sale Date FORMAT`)) +
  geom_bar(color = "grey10", fill = "lightblue", inherit.aes = TRUE) +
  scale_x_discrete(name ="Sale Month", 
                   limits = c("Jan 2023", "Feb 2023", "Mar 2023", 
                      "Apr 2023","May 2023","Jun 2023", 
                      "Jul 2023", "Aug 2023", "Sep 2023",
                      "Oct 2023", "Nov 2023", "Dec 2023", 
                      "Jan 2024", "Feb 2024", "Mar 2024"))+
  theme(axis.text=element_text(size=6))+
  ggtitle("Monthly number of sales")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(x = `Sale Date FORMAT`, y = `Unit Price ($ PSM)`)) +
  scale_x_discrete(name ="Sale Month", 
                 limits = c("Jan 2023", "Feb 2023", "Mar 2023", 
                    "Apr 2023","May 2023","Jun 2023", 
                    "Jul 2023", "Aug 2023", "Sep 2023",
                    "Oct 2023", "Nov 2023", "Dec 2023", 
                    "Jan 2024", "Feb 2024", "Mar 2024")) +
  
  geom_boxplot(color = "grey10", fill = "lightblue") + 
  geom_point(stat="summary", fun ="mean", color = "red") +
  theme(axis.text=element_text(size=6)) +
  ggtitle("Monthly changes in Unit Price ($PSM)")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = Realis, aes(y = `Area (SQM)`, x = `Transacted Price ($)`)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = glm, linewidth = 1) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(30,450), xlim=c(450000,8000000)) +
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = `Postal Code`), fontface = "bold", max.overlaps = 63) +
  ggtitle("Size (SQM) vs Transacted Price ($)")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
